column1: '''Jennifer Hale''' ([[1972]]) is a Canadian-born American voice actress. She has provided voices for several animated productions of [[Disney]] and Marvel, and various roles in ''Star Wars'' video games.
* [[2011]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' - [[Idonna Bellflower]]
* [[2001]]:  [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]] - [[Galadriel]], [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins
